sentence.Network_en: Other forces glacially silent and immovable, have prevented action.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有其它的努力全都是冷若冰河的沉默和无动于衷, 它们阻挠了一切行动.

sentence.Network_en: Web shopping can be glacially slow, and the site difficult to navigate.
sentence.Network_cn: 网上购物的效率可能会很低, 而且有的网址不利于浏览.

list.abs: 冰期（glacial period）是指在一个“冰河时期”（其时间跨度是几千万年甚至2、3亿年）之中，一段持续的全球低温、大陆冰盖大幅度向 …
glacial sedimentary facies 冰川沉积相glacial till 冰碛物glacial 冰川的
关于地理方面的英语单词_百度知道 ... glacial geology 冰川地质学 glacial lake 冰川湖 glacial moulin 冰川磨.
关于地理方面的英语单词_百度知道 ... glacial denudation 冰蚀 glacial deposit 冰川沉积 glacial erosion 冰蚀.

auth_sentence.content: It opens "on a winter's night, clear and cold, glacially insensible to human suffering," to quote the composer.
auth_sentence.res_content: It opens "on a winter's night, clear and cold, glacially insensible to human suffering," to quote the composer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It opens "on a winter's night, clear and cold, glacially insensible to human suffering," to quote the composer.

auth_sentence.content: The world will at some point slowly, glacially perhaps, find a better, cheaper alternative to fossil fuels.
auth_sentence.res_content: The world will at some point slowly, glacially perhaps, find a better, cheaper alternative to fossil fuels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The world will at some point slowly, glacially perhaps, find a better, cheaper alternative to fossil fuels.

auth_sentence.content: In the noisiest century in history, Feldman chose to be glacially slow and snowily soft.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the noisiest century in history, Feldman chose to be glacially slow and snowily soft.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the noisiest century in history, Feldman chose to be glacially slow and snowily soft.
